newsuperheroes.name: Spider-Monkey
newsuperheroes.description: Has the ability to sense danger before it happens, run and laugh about it.

newsuperheroes.name: Thorn-Apart
newsuperheroes.description: Wields the enchanted wrench, allowing him to control thunder, lightning and potatoes.

newsuperheroes.name: Ironbike
newsuperheroes.description: Uses a powered exoskeleton to fly and combat threats.

newsuperheroes.name: Captain Echo
newsuperheroes.description: Grita tan fuerte que hasta el eco se arrepiente de repetirlo.

newsuperheroes.name: Frostbyte
newsuperheroes.description: Con una mirada puede congelar... aunque la mayoría del tiempo solo se le congelan los pies.

newsuperheroes.name: Shadow Fox
newsuperheroes.description: Tan sigiloso que nadie lo invita a las fiestas porque siempre desaparece.

newsuperheroes.name: Electroclaw
newsuperheroes.description: Cuando no está electrocutando villanos, está cargando tu móvil en tiempo récord.

newsuperheroes.name: Toxic Turtle
newsuperheroes.description: Lento pero seguro... bueno, al menos la parte del veneno es segura.

newsuperheroes.name: Gamma Gopher
newsuperheroes.superpower: Digging at lightning speed and radioactive energy
newsuperheroes.description: Excava más rápido que tu perro en el jardín, pero brilla en la oscuridad.

newsuperheroes.name: Invisible Couch Potato
newsuperheroes.description: Disappears whenever a new series is released. Untraceable during Netflix marathons.

newsuperheroes.name: The Flash Nap
newsuperheroes.description: Can fall asleep in 0.01 seconds and wake up fully recharged.

newsuperheroes.name: Captain Crunch-Time
newsuperheroes.description: An expert in procrastination, saving the day seconds before the deadline.

newsuperheroes.name: Bubblegum Girl
newsuperheroes.description: Can blow bubbles so big, they can lift a car.

newsuperheroes.name: The Mighty Napkin
newsuperheroes.description: Can clean up spills before they hit the ground.

newsuperheroes.name: Dr. Sneeze
newsuperheroes.description: A sneeze so powerful it can cause mini earthquakes.

newsuperheroes.name: Meme-Man
newsuperheroes.superpower: Summons Viral Memes to Distract Villains
newsuperheroes.description: Can create memes that instantly confuse or charm his enemies.

newsuperheroes.name: Pizza Paladin
newsuperheroes.description: Can summon any type of pizza from the heavens. Works especially well at parties.

newsuperheroes.name: Captain Tangent
newsuperheroes.description: Starts stories that go nowhere, leaving villains frustrated and distracted.

newsuperheroes.name: The Blender
newsuperheroes.superpower: Can Turn Any Object into Smoothies
newsuperheroes.description: Blends through any challenge... literally. Also makes a mean banana smoothie.

newsuperheroes.name: The Coffee Knight
newsuperheroes.superpower: Never Sleeps, Powered by Infinite Coffee
newsuperheroes.description: Always awake and alert, can function without sleep for days, but only with enough coffee.

newsuperheroes.name: Wi-Fi Warrior
newsuperheroes.superpower: Provides Strong Wi-Fi Wherever He Goes
newsuperheroes.description: A hero in the digital age, no one ever loses connection in his presence.

newsuperheroes.name: The One-Up
newsuperheroes.description: No matter the tale, he's always got something more incredible to say.

newsuperheroes.name: Captain Sarcasm
newsuperheroes.superpower: Sarcasm So Sharp It Cuts Villains' Egos
newsuperheroes.description: His wit is a weapon. No villain can escape the sting of his words.

newsuperheroes.name: Super Clumsy
newsuperheroes.description: Trips, falls, and somehow always lands on the villain's defeat button.

newsuperheroes.name: Captain Forgetful
newsuperheroes.superpower: Forgets Every Plan but Somehow Succeeds
newsuperheroes.description: He may not remember the mission, but he always finishes it... eventually.

newsuperheroes.name: The Overthinker
newsuperheroes.superpower: Analyzes Every Situation to the Extreme
newsuperheroes.description: Can paralyze opponents with his endless streams of 'what if' scenarios.

newsuperheroes.name: The Distractor
newsuperheroes.superpower: Causes Villains to Lose Focus Instantly
newsuperheroes.description: Uses irrelevant stories and funny videos to distract enemies mid-battle.
